top_comments.comment: Do the hermits just not like normal biomes so they decide to make their own. First cub now ren, plus ren made mustafar and tatooine last season lol

comments_since_last_sample.body: Another argument not well disclosed. While we work our normal day-jobs or what not. The Hermits are mining and crafting!
You really have the most epic intros and best Timelapse musics!
